/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, indicating ongoing development and progress. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. The image provides a glimpse into the bustling life and architectural diversity of Beijing.
